name: MarkDownLogs
tagline: An R function library to generate (scientific) reports easily
body:
### MarkDownLogs 
Document & Share your findings in an easy and digestable way.

MarkDownLogs is a set of **R** functions that allows you to generate summaries what you discovered with your source code. It will allow you:

1. Write down your findings in nicely formatted, date-versioned colorful log / report file.
- Support your findings with quick & pretty figures saved along your report
- Link (and show) these in your markdown or html document
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
